option.name: autohide_duration
option._long: Time (in milliseconds) the dock takes to expand and retract

option.name: autohide_show_delay
option._long: Amount of time (in milliseconds) the cursor needs to be in the zone before showing.

option.name: autohide_hide_delay
option._long: Amount of time (in milliseconds) the cursor needs to be out of the zone before hiding.

option.name: full_span
option._long: Wether the dock should extend all the way to the left and right; or top and bottom depending on orientation.

option.name: edge_offset
option._long: The distance from the cursor to the edge of screen to show the panel when it's hidden.

option.name: show_close
option._long: Keep all window icons for up to 2 seconds to allow CSS animations.
